When you pay $1000+ for a phone you better hope it lasts you atleast 3-4 years otherwise you'd just be wasting that money if you had to change your phone every 1-2 years. ", 'Just a regular guy, 14 Nov 2020', "I bought my unlocked phone from eBay from a highly rated seller, 2 years ago. samsung's u... ", 'more', 'Send it for me then ', 'November 2020 update has been released!', 'Got ny s9 two years ago and still its sleek and lovely without any crack or damege though was dropped 2 3 times. ', " 
Performance is excellent and never lagged and stucked with all lits of apps. Super fast and does everything like a charm and in fact basically i can do all online works with this lovely s9. Still its supports all the modern sharing methods and standard technologies. Camera is also good. Music is excellent  with loud sorround sound sterio speakers. Battery one day only but that's enough for me. Peronalisations are immense with lots of sertings .  No any problems occurred so far. Android sent ver 10 for this and now gives only security updates but who cares i love my sleek and high performance  s9.  To improve my  64gb storage,  i fixed 128gb sd card. Love you s9. ", "I bought my unlocked phone from eBay from a highly rated seller, 2 years ago. samsung's u.i. 2.5 update reset the phone to Sprints lease option lock screen, cannot use any more. I guess samsung doesn't want you to use unlocked phones anymore!!!", ' 
', 'My samsung s9 got google etc in the background like a watermark. Not getting a reason or sollution from samsung.', 'Sn, 02 Nov 2020', 'Can we receive it or not', 'I have it too for few days now.. central EU..', 'arksmc05, 28 Oct 2020', 'got one ui 2.5 in india today. ', 'Can we receive it or not', 'Got ONE UI 2.5 update on October 31', ' 
', "Excepting battery life,this phone is still good,cpu it's a beast comparing many other phones,very good screen,camera,stereo sound,premium materials,still looking good for 2020...so i keep using it,still no reason to change...", 'got one ui 2.5 in india today. ', "I really love this phone. After 2 years it's still so fast. The camera has been better after updates. Now it has portrait and night modes too. The screen with no notch or a strange black hole in the middle of it.. I wish these type of phones would come back. Headphone jack via 3.5 mm and a clean/powerful output. Stereo speakers also. The only thing is 3000 mah battery, the rest of it for me is just quite perfect.", 'The phone is great, no doubt about it. I specially like the curved screen and it feels good to hold. Using this phone since it was launched in 2018. But recently I am having this screen blackout issue when trying to lock and unlock suddenly. The simple fix is to unlock the phone 5 seconds after locking it. Rest everything is fine with the phone. Have googled about this and a lot of users seem to have this issue. Little disappointed with this but in no mood to replace until it becomes unusable.', 'Same.. with the update ONE UI 2.1. the phone is faster.. and looks much better overall.. only bad thing battery üîã..']

But i dont think its worth purcha... ', 'more', 'In your opinion, what has drastically improved in other aspects?', 'This is a problem often encountered by Android users. When our device is used for a certain period of time, the memory of the mobile phone will be seriously insufficient, so we will choose to clean up the memory of our mobile phone. And many users will choose the most convenient way to clean up a pile of data directly.', ' 
', ' 
But if you do this, you will often delete some important data, or data you need to use urgently. If the data is not backed up, how can we retrieve the useful data. First of all, you should know that the deleted data and lost data are not really disappeared immediately, but you need the help of other tools to find it.', ' 
', ' 
Many Android users feel that it is a responsible thing to retrieve the deleted data, but it is very simple. You only need an Android data recovery software(http://datas-recovery.com/static/Android-Data-Recovery-Software.html). It can help you retrieve deleted or lost data, such as: contacts, SMS, call history, files, videos, recordings, WhatsApp messages, music, photos, etc. However, it should be noted that when we find that the desired data is lost, the best remedy is to stop using the device and use Android data recovery software as soon as possible. Because the longer it takes, the more likely your lost data will be covered by new data.', ' 
', ' 
See more:', ' 
How to Restore lost/deleted Photos on Android Device', ' 
', 'http://datas-recovery.com/static/restore-lost-deleted-photos-on-samsung.html', ' ', ' 
', '

', 'http://datas-recovery.com/static/Best-way-to-Retrieve-Data-after-Factory-Reset.html', ' ', ' 
', '

', 'http://datas-recovery.com/static/Recover-Lost-Data-from-an-Rooted-Android-Phone.html', ' ', 'Darksoul, 03 Aug 2020', "Guys, I'm planning to buy S9 now but before that I wanted to hear from you geeks. Please ... ", 'more', "30-35K is pretty decent budget for an excellent smart phone. But i dont think its worth purchasing this mobile in 2020. The only feature i felt good in the phone is its curved screen and camera. Apart from that nothing else is so fascinating to speak about. I am sure there are some other apps in the phone which are killing the battery unnecessarily. The fast charging is pretty quick but that shouldn't mean battery can drain just like that.The phone has rich look and feels excellent to hold but when in emergency i think you will not be able to rely on this phone. Its just like iphone draining battery for no reason. At the budget you specified i would suggest you to go with M31 or other models. if you are fine with frequent charging and looking for stylish phone then you can go with s9. ", "The Samsung S9 is the phone that made me finally stop using Samsung. Now, I think I hate Samsung phones. I was a loyal customer and have used Samsung as early as the S3, and the Note 5. I loved those phones. The S9 is a different animal. everything about this phone is worse than it's predecessors. The most important thing is how slow this phone has become after less than 2 years of use. I purchased this phone on a 2 year tab, and I expect it to be functional throughout this time, but in less than one year, it ground to a halt because of the bloatware. It is so frustrating to click a link, only for the page to continue loading and click something else. Touch typing is almost non functional with the lag. Trying to use the phone in an emergency sucks, because your emergency has to wait for the phone app to load. No problem i thought, I will just root the phone and get rid of this GARBAGE bloatware Samsung include. Well, Samsung sunk a lot of money into making sure you couldn't do that easily. It is much harder to root or install custom OS on the S9 than it's predecessors. ", ' 
', ' 
So in conclusion, buy Samsung phones if you want a phone that has so much bloatware that it grinds to a halt in less than a year, and it is extremely difficult to root to get rid of the bloatware. ', 'very good phone and excellentperformance  ', 'If someone still has their box, can they please share the dimensions l x b x h.', ' 
', ' 
Thanks', "Guys, I'm planning to buy S9 now but before that I wanted to hear from you geeks. Please let me know whether I can go for this or should I wait and go for something else. Kindly suggest. ", ' 
Budget: 30-35k ']

', "It came down to Samsung S9 and Huawei P20 Pro for me. I opted for the S9. One week later I kind of regret my decision. Here's why:", ' 
', " 
1) The biggie for me is the S9 design. The rounded-edge screen is good for nothing but causing unwanted inputs because it's hard to hold the device without accidentally pressing something. It also feels like chances of dropping the device are high because you're always trying to minimize contact with the edges. I don't like it at all and I don't understand why Samsung bothers with this.", ' 
', "

2. The "Bixby" button. I hate it, because all it can do is just summoning for the Bixby panel, which is quite slow to appear and doesn't something really useful. Thanks ", "Battery drain quickly, make sure you update all the apps through the google app store and all the Samsung the software updates in the settings (swipe down and touch the gear icon, which is the shortcut icon to the settings). Just had one today that included the September security patch for android. Second make sure no apps are running in the background (drains battery and may eat data since content/information always refreshes every certain amount of time). Also i would suggest turn off the data, if you are using wifi in the home or friends or like a restaurant that offers free wifi for its customer. Also make sure your are using the original charger for this phone that is included in the box, no third party or counterfeit ones that you get cheaply (I think the phone will tell you charger is not genuine or charge slowly (not really, since it may not even charge at all)). If all of this doesn't work, try this before going to bed, let the phone drain completely (turns the phone off on its own), then after about a 1 minute plug it in using the original charger or if you own the wireless charger pad from Samsung, again no weird third party crap, use that to completely charge to 100% while you sleep. Then try to use the phone normally. If that still doesn't work, then i would suggest contacting Samsung or find a different phone according to your liking. Not acceptable at all. Time to move from samsung.', "Let me tell you a story. My journey begin with the S6 Active. In the end, I won't forget how knox only made rooting more difficult and my active died due to water immersion. But the specs were good. I decided to purchase the entire VR package for the samsung S7. First of all, it works. (with a little fan to help cooling) You will lose yourself in a unique experiance that you won't find anywhere in this world. But as time goes on, this feature became a gimmick. As a phone, the S7 revealed a nature that ultimately lost all my faith for what this company believes in. ", " 
The truth is that samsung fans don't believe that there is anything better because samsung market their products extremely well, so well that even I my had trouble to look away. Unfortunately for samsung, I do understand what a true, user-orientated phone can achieve. My first non-apple experiance was a blackberry z10. If you've never tried a z10, I highly suggest that you should give it a go. Their minimalistic approach, followed by a concise point in all their applications resulted in something practical. Swipe up and right and you pretty much have all your emails and text brought up. Swipe up and left opens the menu. Double pressing volume up and down skips a song and battery is swappable so you don't have to worry about it. Unfortunately blackberry now produce junkfood. Should you be interested, just google blackberry z10 virtual keyboard and tell me how nifty is that. ", " 
As for the S7, the battery simply won't last for a day. It comes bloated with S home, Sgear, S-every where. Regardless if my mother makes a good application, samsung thinks they can make it better. In the end? All the propiotary apps are unable to be removed. An update later will more than likely re-enable them. Samsung-pay beggs you throughout your week to try it and while Samsung finally found out that they needed more cpu power, they just upgrade the main-chip and call it a S8. ", " 
Simply said, I currently have a Sony Xperia xz1 Compact. Clean android performance with a snapdragon 835. A nostagic attempt in trying to bring the compact factor back into android(reminded me my z10 when I saw it in bestbuy) and, to my surprise, it lasts twice as long as my s7. Yes, I forgot to charge it one night and it was avalible the NIGHT OF NEXT DAY.  It doesn't overheat when I needed to run google play and google maps in my car during the summer and thank god that it won't ask me to try samsung pay every sunday. ", " 
tldr for people who still buys a samsung, just give sony or another company a chance. You are going to like the way you look. If you don't look things at a diffrent angle, you are just a pray for the anglerfish.", '
